title: "Fill except button"
body: I just wanted to tell you guys about an idea i had, after recently playing a ranked match, and i hope to get riots attention for it. I wanted to play a ranked match, and i had to choose my roles. Usually i pick Bot and Mid, but this time i felt like filling. One problem was though, that i am really not the best jungler. I thought to myself, whatever, the chance of getting jungle isnt high anyways. But, as you might expect, i got jungle. Every other lane wouldve been okay, but i really suck in jungling, and i kinda caused the loss for my team. I wonder if it would be possible to create a so called "Fill except" button, so that you can pick fill, except for example jungle. Problems like that wouldnt happen anymore then. Pls tell me about your opinion about this guys. :)

replies.body:
Welcome to the German boards! Have a Bratwurst with Sauerkraut and a cold beer and enjoy your stay here :D

The problem with "fill except" is that there will be even less supports than there are right now, and the queue times are already horrible, even for lower divisions...
